reporter_caption.center: AKAMINE v. HAWAIIAN PACKING AND CRATING CO., LTD., 53 Haw. 592 (1972)

caption.center: Dependents of EDWARD K. AKAMINE, Deceased, Claimants-Appellants v.
HAWAIIAN PACKING AND CRATING CO., LTD., Employer-Appellee and THEO H.
DAVIES AND COMPANY, LTD., Insurance Carrier-Appellee

opinion.panel: RICHARDSON, C.J., MARUMOTO, ABE, LEVINSON and KOBAYASHI, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The petition for rehearing is denied without argument. Marumoto and Levinson, JJ., who dissented, do not concur.
opinion.attorneys: Donald A. Beck and Roland Q.F. Thom (Cades Schutte Fleming Wright of counsel), attorneys for employer-appellee and insurance carrier-appellee for the petition.Page 593
